name: Syst√®me de traitement automatis√© des factures avec OCR et IA - Automatisation AP avec Airtable
description:
# Introduction vid√©o
[![image.png](fileId:1519)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rfu4MSvtpAw)


# Automatisation du traitement des factures

Ce mod√®le est l'automatisation derri√®re un outil simple d'automatisation des factures entrantes (automatisation AP) construit dans Airtable.

Le lien vers la base Airtable et tous les autres outils utilis√©s se trouve dans les notes √† gauche de l'automatisation.

## Comment √ßa fonctionne
D√©couvrez comment cela fonctionne en vid√©o : [Vid√©o compl√®te](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rfu4MSvtpAw)

1) Nous recevons un e-mail avec une pi√®ce jointe de facture :
![image.png](fileId:1384)

2) Traite et ajoute les donn√©es √† une interface Airtable : ![image.png](fileId:1385)

3) Une fois que nous l'avons approuv√©e et que la date d'√©ch√©ance approche, elle appara√Æt parmi les factures dues, o√π nous pouvons suivre si elle a √©t√© pay√©e.

###### Vous cherchez une personnalisation ou une application commerciale sur mesure ? [üìû R√©servez un appel](https://smoothwork.ai/book-a-call/) | [üí¨ DM moi sur Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mil%C3%A1n-v%C3%A1s%C3%A1rhelyi-3a9985123/)

parameters.content:
# Invoice Processing Automation

### This template is the automation behind a simple incoming invoice automation tool (AP automation) tool built in Airtable.

### Follow the instructions below to get all parts working!

## Video walkthrough and demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rfu4MSvtpAw

## To get a similar business tool tailored to your processes, book a call with us: https://automable.ai/book-a-call/, or write to me at: vasarmilan@gmail.com

# **Step by step setup instructions below: ‚¨áÔ∏è‚¨áÔ∏è**

parameters.text:
=Given the following invoice in the <invoice> xml tags, extract the following information as listed below.

If you cannot the information for a specific item, then leave blank and skip to the next. Do **not come up with example or hallucinated information in any case!**

Invoice Date format: YYYY/MM/DD

{
  "Invoice Date":            { "type": "string", "format": "date" },
  "Due Date":            { "type": "string", "format": "date" },
  "Invoice Number":          { "type": "string" },
  "Vendor Name":           { "type": "string" },
  "Vendor Tax ID":         { "type": "string" },
  "Product Name": { "type": "string" },
  "Price without Tax":       { "type": "number" },
  "Price with Tax":          { "type": "number" }
}

If no tax displayed, price with and without should be the same!

<invoice>{{ $json.choices[0].message.content }}</invoice>

parameters.content:
Gets all messages that:
1) Have an attachment
2) Do not have the label invoice_checked
3) Text matches invoice

parameters.text:
You can see the image of an invoice.

Extract the following information as listed below.

In any way, extract everything from the image.

If you cannot the information for a specific item, then leave blank and skip to the next. Do **not come up with example or hallucinated information in any case!**

Invoice date
Invoice Due Date
-- comment: sometimes instead of an explicit date it would have "immediate" payment, then it's the same as date; or eg. "30 days from receipt" in which case it's date + 30 days etc.)
invoice number
Supplier name
Supplier Tax ID
Name of Product or Service (if there are multiple, make it a general name, such as "marketing services" or "computer parts and accessories")
Price without Tax
Price with Tax (total price)
If no tax displayed, price with and without should be the same!

Respond in a nice structured, easy to read format.

options.systemPromptTemplate:
You are an expert extraction algorithm.
Only extract relevant information from the text.
If you do not know the value of an attribute asked to extract, you may omit the attribute's value.

attributes.name: vendor_id
attributes.description: Vendor ID. Or empty string ("") if there is no match.

parameters.content:
# *1. Set up Airtable*

## 1 - [Register an Airtable account here](https://airtable.partnerlinks.io/xfs4x6q28m4x)

## 2 - Duplicate [this base](https://airtable.com/appFMuGzhsUxbFKUh/shrOP5l52wxZ5IYSI)

## 3 - Follow the [n8n Airtable credential instructions](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/airtable/). PAT is better. Add the credential to the Airtable nodes.

## 4 - Click to both Airtable nodes on the right, and choose the table on the yellow note ‚û°Ô∏è‚û°Ô∏è

# 2. Set Up ConvertAPI

## 1 - [Register a ConvertAPI account here](https://convertapi.com?ref=cq5du)

## 2 - Get an API key, and save it somewhere safe

## 3 - Create a Header Auth credential in Credentials, and add it to the "PDF -> JPG - ConvertAPI" Node in the automation.
### TODO: Change the Base to the duplicated base, and the table to "Invoices"
### TODO: Change the Base to the duplicated base, and the table to "Vendors"

# 3. Set up Gmail

## 1 - Create the "invoice_checked" label

## 2 - [Follow the instructions](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/oauth-single-service/#finish-your-n8n-credential) by n8n to set this up. Video available at the end of the article

## 3 - Choose your Gmail credentials, and add to all Gmail nodes if needed.

# 4. Set up OpenAI

## Follow the [n8n instructions](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/openai/) to connect your OpenAI platform account.
### TODO: Add the ConvertAPI Header Auth
